of specialists. 
Applications in Google Play : Ahmad Tea, Купи легко! , ФСИН-Письмо, HiNews, Utair, Альфа банк, Альфа кредит, БМ Бизнес и Квартплата (Банк Москвы), Docke
JAVA

Reksoft Co. Ltd., St. Petersburg, Russia. Our team developed VoIP sniffer
application to record SIP and SCCP (Skinny) calls from the network or from a
 pre-recorded file. The application recorded the calls with RTP audio streams and
 supported majority of the complex call scenarios including Call Forwarding,
 Conferences, Call Transfers, Pickup and Hunt groups etc. for Siemens OSV and
 Cisco UCM PBX. DTMF, Comfort noise, Silence suppression, IP defragmentation
 and many other features were supported as well.
 SCRUM process was used.
 Tools and platforms: Java SE, Eclipse, Perforce, Atlassian Confluence, Jira and
 Bamboo, Wireshark, Sparx Enterprise Architect, JainSip, JNetPcap, spring
 dependency injection, SIPp, JUnit, Mockito.
JAVA
